string-array.name: exercise_descriptions
string-array.item: Body weight and external weight exercises to build strength and promote growth in muscles
Low intensity and high intensity workouts to build a healthy heart and cardiovascular strength
Prolonged low intensity workouts to build oxygen supply and time under tension
Exercises that promote stretching and flexing of muscles to increase motion in muscles and joints
Activities that help with mind and muscle connection to form better coordination
Movements that focus on centering the body to aid in better balance
